Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'They all relied on their own ideals, their experience... and then they just died, leaving me here alone with the pain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'They were all the same.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I joined the Military Academy... studied tactics... all because I wanted to do something... for someone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But why... What went wrong?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera starts pummeling the walls with her fists, letting the pain course through her veins.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's all the Punishing Virus's fault! Why did this stupid virus have to appear? Why do humans have to be defeated by some dumb virus?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's not my fault! I didn't do anything wrong. I always try to offer suggestions, but no one ever listens.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I always do my job to the best of my ability, but some things are just impossible!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's not my fault at all! I'm not Death... I don't want to be Death!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I came to the battlefield to save people!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vera's M.I.N.D. begins to boil, dizziness overtaking her throbbing head."}
{2: '???', 3: "...Can't you be quieter, bud? Did you really have to yell all that out like that?"}
{3: 'As Vera slumps against the wall, a familiar voice speaks from the detention room next door. It is the Construct who called Vera "Death".'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'So you heard all of that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Yeah.'}
{3: 'Silence follows. After a few minutes, the Construct speaks again.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "I'm sorry... I shouldn't have called you Death."}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Hey, say something, yeah? It took me a while to speak up. Apologizing takes courage, you know.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Apology accepted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Is that all?'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Tch, you're a weird one. We still have a while left in here. Shall we chat?"}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "People spread rumors because of your aloof attitude. Don't you know?"}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't want to go with the flow. I didn't become a Construct and enter the battlefield to please others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Same here.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Like you, I didn't end up amounting to anything. The others, too."}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'So I guess I changed, too. For the worse.'}
{3: 'All who chose to become soldiers did so for their own reasons... but they inevitably succumb to the pressure on the battlefields.'}
{3: 'Not even Vera remembers what motivated her in the beginning.'}
{3: 'All she remembers is fleeing from battlefields... only to be forced to enter the next battlefield, which she will also flee from.'}
{3: 'She curls up in the corner, fists balled up in front of her chest, clutching the fabric of her shirt.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "What's the point of surviving every battle? My life right now... Can it even be called living?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'The world is filled with nothing but despair and pain. What can we even do?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'In my next mission... I might as well just... Ow, my chest...', 4: '1'}
